external_references.description: M. Porolli. (2021, January 21). Operation Spalax: Targeted malware attacks in Colombia. Retrieved September 16, 2022.

description: For [Operation Spalax](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0005), the threat actors used packers that read pixel data from images contained in PE files' resource sections and build the next layer of execution from the data.(Citation: ESET Operation Spalax Jan 2021)
